text: Oh no! We love Liam Payne and so do his 1D bandmates, which is why one of them is worried that he ’ s about to get seriously hurt by new love Cheryl Fernandez - Versini! HollywoodLife. com has the EXCLUSIVE details on why Harry Styles thinks she ’ s totally wrong for him. Liam Payne, 22, has been spending lots of time with new girlfriend, British X - Factor judge Cheryl Fernadez - Versini, 32, as of late.
